entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
